title: A Chinese actor’s kidnapping reignites fears over travelling to Southeast Asia, and renews concerns over scam centers run by criminal gangs
description: Users on Chinese social media app Xiaohongshu asked if it was safe to travel to Thailand while a Hong Kong singer-actor canceled his Bangkok concert.
author: Lionel Lim
excerpt: Users on Chinese social media app Xiaohongshu asked if it was safe to travel to Thailand while a Hong Kong singer-actor canceled his Bangkok concert.
text: A Chinese actor’s kidnapping reignites fears over travelling to Southeast Asia, and renews concerns over scam centers run by criminal gangsChinese tourists take memorial photographs during their visit to Wat Arun, or the Temple of Dawn, in Bangkok on Jan. 13, 2025.Anusak Laowilas—NurPhoto via Getty Images
html:
A Chinese actor’s kidnapping reignites fears over travelling to Southeast Asia, and renews concerns over scam centers run by criminal gangs

Chinese tourists take memorial photographs during their visit to Wat Arun, or the Temple of Dawn, in Bangkok on Jan. 13, 2025.

Anusak Laowilas—NurPhoto via Getty Images
